vertex_delete_buffer.htm+html.head.title: vertex_delete_buffer.htm+html.body.p:87-3
vertex_delete_buffer: This function can be used to remove a previously created vertex buffer (see vertex_create_buffer()) from system memory. This will also remove all vertex data for any custom primitives that it contained.

vertex_delete_buffer.htm+html.head.title: vertex_delete_buffer.htm+html.body.p:109-3
vertex_delete_buffer: The above code will delete from memory the buffer indexed in the variable "v_buff".
